title: Kugera Kwacu ku Isi
subtitle: Urusobe rwacu rugera mu bihugu {{count}} ku migabane myinshi, ruhuza ubuhanga butandukanye kugira ngo duhindure uburezi mu Rwanda.

headquarters.title: Icyicaro Gikuru mu Rwanda
headquarters.description: Ibiro byacu bikuru biherereye muri Kigali Alliance Business Center, Kigali, Rwanda - umutima w'ikoranabuhanga rikura cyane muri Afurika. Aho niho duhuza ubufatanye bwacu bw'isi yose kugira ngo dutange ingaruka nziza ku burezi bw'abana.
